# Badge

## Import

```jsx live=false
import { Badge } from '@totejs/uikit';
```

## Usage

```jsx
<Badge>default</Badge>
```

## ColorScheme

```jsx
<HStack>
  {['primary', 'success', 'warning', 'danger'].map((item, index) => (
    <Badge key={index} colorScheme={item}>
      {item}
    </Badge>
  ))}
</HStack>
```

## Props

<PropsTable
  data={[
    {
      name: 'colorShceme',
      required: false,
      type: '"primary" | "success" | "danger" | "warning"',
      default: '"primary"',
    },
  ]}
/>
